meanings.definition: Lamellicorns: a group of beetles characterized by antennae with lamellate clubs
meanings.sent1: The lamellicorns crawled slowly on the ground.
meanings.sent2: I learned about lamellicorns in my science class.
meanings.sent3: Why did the lamellicorns throw a party? Because they were clubbed together!
meanings.sent4: The lamellicorns' antennae were like tiny clubs waving in the air.
meanings.sent5: In the garden, the lamellicorns with their club-like antennae were a fascinating sight.

meanings.definition: Lamellicorns: beetles of the family Lamellicornia, including dung beetles and scarab beetles
meanings.sent1: We observed the lamellicorns rolling dung balls.
meanings.sent2: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring lamellicorns.
meanings.sent3: Why did the lamellicorns go on strike? They were tired of rolling dung!
meanings.sent4: The scarab lamellicorns were like precious jewels in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful lamellicorns scurrying around the park.
